text: Nilakanth Moreshvar Pingale (Moreshvar Pingale) was the Peshwa (1683–89) of Maratha Empire. He was the son of Moropant Trimbak Pingale and the elder brother of Bahiroji Pingale. In 1689, he was killed together with the Maratha King Sambhaji. ==References== Category:People of the Maratha Empire Category:People from Maharashtra Category:1689 deaths
title: Moreshvar Pingale
